title: Los Angeles/Northwest
name: Taco Zone Truck
address: On Alvarado just north of Reservoir
directions: Parked next to the Vons grocery store on the northbound side of Alvarado
content: One of the best taco trucks on the east side, with delicious tacos, burritos, and quesadillas.  Be prepared to wait if there is a crowd, and there usually is, but the homemade salsas alone are well worth it.  Opens most evenings around 8-8:30PM.
